instructions: Toss together cereal, pretzels, crackers and peanuts in large microwaveable bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients in small bowl. Pour over cereal mixture; toss to coat.
Microwave uncovered on High 10 minutes, stirring every 3 minutes.
Spread on foil or paper towels to cool. Store in airtight container.
